name: BiweeklyBinCollection
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: biweekly bin
des:
When the bin collection of your area is biweekly, you can create your own bin collection skill.
All setting can be done by your voice.

How to invocate
・Alexa, open Biweekly Bin

Check a bin collection on the day
・What is the collection today
・Tomorrow bin collection
・Collection on August 10

Register bin collection schedule 
("first week” defined as the week of 2020/06/28-2020/7/4, 
 "second week” defined as the week of 2020/07/05-2020/07/11)
・register Monday garbage
・register first Tuesday recycle
・register second Friday garbage

Check all the registration
・Check all,

Delete all registered data
・Delete all

Delete one data
・Delete Monday
・Delete second Tuesday
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
